text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā kupitā anattamanā talasattikaṃ uggireyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā kupitā anattamanā talasattikaṃ uggireyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 153. Should any bhikkhunī, angered and displeased, raise the palm of her hand against (another) bhikkhunī, it is to be confessed.
